instruction: Build a chatbot for a website
output: A chatbot for a website should be able to interact with users in natural language, either through text or voice input. The chatbot should be able to understand user intents and provide correct responses. It should also have the ability to learn from past conversations and suggest relevant suggestions to users. In order to ensure a good customer experience, the chatbot should be able to integrate with customer service protocols and handle basic customer service queries.
